host.name: Eris
host.about:
Hi, I‚Äòm Eris, I am married and have two children. Aside of hosting the guests, we run a travel agency and tour operator here in Tirana.
Traveling often we want to offer our guests what we would like to have when we stay in other places: first courtesy and then cleanliness.
highlights: My work: Travel agency & tours operator

listing.title: Mozart Luxury & Spacious House - Heart of City
listing.subtitle: Entire condo in Tiran√´, Albania

highlights.title: Self check-in
highlights.subtitle: Check yourself in with the lockbox.

highlights.title: Extra spacious
highlights.subtitle: Guests love this home‚Äôs spaciousness for a comfortable stay.

highlights.title: Free cancellation before May 10
highlights.subtitle: Get a full refund if you change your mind.

listing.description:
The newest charming, contemporary house in the heart of Tirana city. Just couple blocks away from amazing restaurants, Skanderbeg square, cafes, bars, see sights, and so much more. One of the best pastry shops- Le Bon is on the first floor of the building. Perfect for weekend getaway, business trip, staycation, work-from-home alternative (100Mbps)or cozy home base while
exploring everything Mozart has to offer. In all its spaces there are large windows with thermyc glasses.The airport is 25 min.

details.title: Getting around
details.content: The apartment is located in a new building, on "Zogu I" boulevard, right in front of the Ministry of Justice of Albania, 3 minutes' walk from "Skanderbeg Square".

rules.title: Carbon monoxide alarm not reported
rules.subtitle: The Host hasn't reported a carbon monoxide alarm on the property. We suggest bringing a portable detector for your trip.

amenities.title: Essentials
amenities.subtitle: Towels, bed sheets, soap, and toilet paper

amenities.title: Clothing storage: closet, wardrobe, and dresser
Fast wifi ‚Äì 104 Mbps
amenities.subtitle: Verified by speed test. Stream 4K videos and join video calls on multiple devices.

amenities.title: Kitchen
amenities.subtitle: Space where guests can cook their own meals

amenities.title: Cooking basics
amenities.subtitle: Pots and pans, oil, salt and pepper

amenities.title: Elevator
amenities.subtitle: The home or building has an elevator that‚Äôs at least 52 inches deep and a doorway at least 32 inches wide

amenities.title: Carbon monoxide alarm
amenities.subtitle: This place may not have a carbon monoxide detector. Reach out to the host with any questions.

reviews.comments: üëç
a really nice room, good bed and nice view
A very nice place. Very clean and at a very nice location.
Well located in TirƒÅna city Center
Modern apartment located 5 minutes from the main square, numerous restaurants and clubs nearby, great value for money, super helpful host. Highly recommended
A brilliant airbnb with a spectacular view of Tirana and the surrounding scenery. Very good host and super communicative with clear check in. Thank you!
As described
üëçüèª

Eris was a great host! The place was great, we felt safe as two girls who have never been to tirana!
You had a gorgeous cafe downstairs named Le bon with great pastries, cakes etc

The apartment was sparkling clean especially the sheets!!. Eris was very helpful with instructions on how to get into the apartment and local shops to get a few stuff we needed. The WIFI was super fast and we enjoyed our stay in Tirana üòä
Really nice place, Eris was helpful
Tirana loved it and having a place to rest and enjoy  the city is very important. We enjoyed Mozzart  Luxury Appartments a lot. It's how it looks in the listing photos. I recommend it 100%.
Excellent modern and stylish balcony apartment, right in a cool neighbourhood section of central Tirana, with a stunning Mountain view, very good value.
Everything was perfect and very clean
We enjoyed this apt :)
Modern and clean apartment close to center. Outside area was very nice with my morning coffee

The apartment looks like the pictures, is very clean and the balcony is nice. however, we had booked it mainly because the service that you can leave your luggage on late departure is offered. Unfortunately, the service was not offered. We could only leave our luggage for 3 hours after checkout but our flight was late in the evening. Because of the luggage we had to cancel our plans for the day and could not enjoy our last day in Tirana, which was very annoying.

Really centrally situated and enjoyed walking from here.
Also we foolishly locked ourselves out the first day, and she responded immediately and kindly came to put the key back in the lock box for us.

Eris was a very nice host and responded whenever I needed it. Even when there was trouble in the appartment complex, Eris was making sure it would be fixed and kept me posted during the proces.
The appartment was very modern and clean and I really liked staying there. The best thing about the appartment, in my opinion, is the balcony with the view of Mt. Dajti!
Thankyou Eris!
Super nice place , right in the middle of the city . Everything within walking distance. Eris is a super friendly host , very helpful with any questions .

The host was really responsive and helpful, replying super quickly to all / any queries we had. The location was great, super easy to get to the central square, the parks and also great transportation links for outside of Tirana. Overall this is a great stay for a good price! Thank you!
Very clean and comfortable AirBnb, right in the city center. Everything super to achieve. Everything that was discussed was complied with and the communication was very quick and easy.

Very beautiful the apartment, close to everything
Restaurant, Market , Bars & Downtown
Everything is very neat and clean

My stay at Eris' Airbnb was lovely. Everything is new in the apartment, it feels fresh and clean. The views are fantastic, too. The location is perfect, very central to everything one might need. Eris' communication was fast and friendly. My stay was great, I highly recommend staying at Eris' apartment while visiting Tirana!

We had a wonderful stay at Eris‚Äô place. The apartment was very modern and had everything we needed. The location was superb. Just a short walk to Skenderbeg Square and many cafes and restaurants around. We especially loved Golosa which was just a 5 minute walk.
Thanks for hosting we hope to be back soon!
Beautiful place. Even better looking than the photos. Great location. Comfortable stay.

One of the best AirBnBs we have stayed in so far.  Everything was clean and tidy and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Tirana here.  Located above a lovely cafe which was perfect for snacks and deserts throughout our stay.  We would stay here again.

Fantastic property within 5 mins of Tirana centre. Host was friendly and responsive. Balcony had stunning views of surrounding mountains. A number of nice bars and restaurants nearby.
Note that the area is up and coming and there were a number of properties under construction, including near this property.
Comfortable apartment in a great location.

We had a lovely stay at the host's.
The apartment is in a great location , close to the large square , surrounded by shops and restaurants.
The host has always been responsive and caring.
I would this property.üëç
We'll be glad to come back.

Had a fantastic 3 night stay here. Firstly Eris communication was first class, answering any questions I had and was quick to respond. The apartment was modern, clean and comfortable with all you needed. Balcony was a bonus with great views over the city with a mountain backdrop. Had many a cappuccino/beer sitting there watching the world go by. The apartment is very central so easy to walk to all the main attractions. Would highly recommend this apartment and if I‚Äôm ever in Tirana again would definitely stay here again.

You can reach everywhere on foot in the center of the city. For those who will come by car, there is paid parking under the building, but it is a little expensive, the host recommended a place within 7-8 minutes walking distance. It was very nice.

We loved staying at Eris's apartment. He provided us with excellent instructions to find the apartment and for self check in. Eris was a great communicator and checked in with us. The apartment is clean, bright, modern and spacious. The bed is very comfortable and the shower is excellent. The balcony is an added bonus. The apartment is located in the perfect position; we were able to walk through the lovely tree lined streets of Tirana to all the major attractions. On the ground floor of the building is an excellent restaurant with delicious food at very reasonable prices. There are also supermarkets near by. I would highly recommend staying at Eris's apartment.
Perfect Host. very responsive
reviews.response: Thank you so much Jose üôè

reviews.comments:
This is a great apartment in a great location as well! Everything is within a short walk. Skanderbeg Sq is a 5-minute walk.
The grocery store and bakery are very close. Eris and Rinalda are perfect hosts and very responsive. I will definitely stay here again!
reviews.response:
Thank you so much Lauran for sharing your experience with us. We're really happy to know that you enjoyed the stay to us üòä
It will be a pleasure for us to welcome you back again soon üòä
Sincerely,
Eris

reviews.comments: The location was very central. You can find anything you want around also there were such a nice bakery under of building to get something morning. House was clean also it looks like the same of picture. So truly I liked to stay there. Eris was understandable for late check out so I appreciate his treatment. I would stay again if I come again.
reviews.response: Hi Muhammed, thank you so much for your kind words and for the time you found for writing. It was a pleasure hosting you. Hope to see you again. Good bye friend üôÇ

reviews.comments: Nice and clean accomodation offering a comfortable stay close to Tirana city centre. Parking on site was possible at an extra fee but was very convenient.
reviews.response:
Thank you Megi for the words also for the time you found to share your good experience with us üòä
You were a great guest. Hope to host you again soon üòä

reviews.comments:
We felt very comfortable in the apartment and would have liked to have stayed longer. To discover Tirana, it is a good base.
Communication with Eris was great and everything was clean and cozy.
We will be happy to come back.
reviews.response: Lisa you were a great guest. It was a pleasure hosting you. We hope to host you again soon üòä

reviews.comments: Eric was a super host, everything perfect! I'd repeat!
reviews.response: Thank you Ernesto for the good words and also for the time you found to share your experience with us. You remain welcome to us ;)

reviews.comments: Very nice apartment and well located. Eris is available for any questions/recommendations. We had a lovely stay. We recommend!
reviews.response: Thanks a lot Carmen. It was a pleasure hosting you ‚ò∫Ô∏è

reviews.comments: What a wonderful stay, location top downstairs is a very good restaurant for breakfast and lunch! The main square is within a 10-minute walk. The apartment was clean, large and comfortable! Perfect location for a few days tirana.
reviews.response: Thanks Vincent for sharing your experience with us. Also for us it was a pleasure hosting you. See you next time üòä

reviews.comments: Nice place to stay and v central
reviews.response: Thanks dear Maximilian

reviews.comments: The residence is very beautiful and elegant, and it is close to the center. There is a beautiful area that includes cafes and restaurants. The person was friendly and helped me a lot and gave me places to go to. I will come back again
reviews.response: Thanks a lot Nawaf. It was a really pleasure hosting you. You'll be always welcome to us üôÇ

reviews.comments:
Highly recommended. Eris is an excellent host, very caring and helpful. It made it very easy for us to stay in Tirana.
The house was spotless, totally new, very cozy and has all the amenities on offer.
I would definitely go back.
reviews.response: Thanks a lot Ilde, for good words also for the time you found to share your experience with us. We will be glad to have the possibility to host you again

reviews.comments:
Excellent apartment and an excellent host.
The apartment is nicely decorated, with a spacious living room, with a nice view of the mountains, very well equipped, and with nice furniture.
The room and bathroom are spacious and comfortable as well.
Everything is brand new, including the building.
Good and reliable wi-fi.
Great location, close to various attractions in Tirana.
I really recommend to anyone coming to Tirana to stay at Eris' apartment.
reviews.response:
Thank you Augusto
It was a pleasure hosting you
See you next time ‚ò∫Ô∏è

reviews.comments:
Modern, spaceous and clean apartment.
Nice balcony with sunset view!
Walking distance to the city center and restaurants
reviews.response: Thank you so much Hanna for sharing your experience with us. You're welcome again :)

reviews.comments: It was a nice modern place that was very clean. However, the surrounding area is undergoing construction so there was a bit of noise during the day. Also, perhaps due to this, the water supply to the apartment did not work for the last day of our stay which was quite unfortunate. However Eris did his best to keep us informed.
reviews.response: Thanks Mathias For sharing your experience with us

reviews.comments:
Very pleasant stay.
Lovely place
reviews.response: Many thanks Virginia for the 5-star rating. It was a pleasure hosting you. See you next time üòä

reviews.comments: Perfect location, just a few steps from the city centre. Modern and fully equipped apartment with all comforts. It felt like home. Definitely recommended!
reviews.response:
Mario,
Thank you for sharing your experience with us and also for the ki d words

reviews.comments: Perfect!

reviews.comments: Lovely apartment in a good location, everything was super clean. We had booked last minute but that was not a problem for the host. Host is super friendly and helpful, really a topper. The only downside is the work in her building that cause some noise nuisance but nothing extreme. Will definitely be back next year.

Thanks Wout that you shared your experience with us.

reviews.comments: Very good place

reviews.comments: Eris is a veri kind person. When I entered the apartment, floors was not clean. Excep this situation everything was well about the apartment.
reviews.response: Thanks Ali. Your comment has our full attention

reviews.comments: What can I say. It was an absolute pleasure to stay at Eris place. You couldn't ask for more. Exactly like in the pictures, super modern, extremely clean and spacious rooms. The apartment was fully equipped and even when it's very central, it's quiet inside the apartment. There was even a body length mirror which I personally very appreciate. And the view just phenomenal. Also Eris was super responsive and always there to help. All around very recommendable :)
reviews.response:
Dear Eva,
Your compliments for our apartment an our service are greatly appreciated üòä. We work diligently to offer the best service and a nice stay for our guests. It is nice to know when this succeeded.
Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for taking time to write this wonderful review.
We look forward to your return üôÇ
Kind regards,
Rinalda & Eris

reviews.comments: Large quiet and modern apartment with everything you need in Tirana. The apartment is well appointed with kitchen utensils, washing machine and air condition. The location is great, very central, everything is within walking distance. Eris is very helpful and communication was good. Glad to come back!
reviews.response:
Thank you Larissa
We are glad for having you as guests.
You remain welcome any time :)

reviews.comments: Eris‚Äôs place was really nice! A great location‚Ä¶ everything was within walking distance. Eris was very responsive and helped us with everything we needed.

Eris is really nice. The place has enough room and great view on the balcony. The gate seems to be still under construction but won‚Äôt affect the whole residence. Got a little bit confused since there are two doors but Eris helped me solve the problems real quick. Definitely worth it.

reviews.comments:
This is a very nice brand new apartment. Less than 10 minute walk to the square with many cafes, restaurants, and a couple good sized grocery store nearby. It was so nice to be in an apartment that‚Äôs set up so well you comfortably use the entire space. You actually can sit on the couch and not have your rear end want to go numb after only a short bit. There are huge windows with lots of natural
light and a nice balcony. The are also blackout shades in the bedroom if you want to sleep in. Our host helped us out with all our questions and we couldn‚Äôt be happier about our stay.
reviews.response:
Dear friends, thanks a lot for your kind words üôÇ
We're glad that you were satisfied of our apartment and appreciate too much that you found the time to share your experience with us.
You're always welcome in our apartment as good friends üòä

reviews.comments: Eris is a very good host.  He guided us very well from the beginning to the end of our stay.  The house is very spacious and just as it looks in the pictures.  The location was perfect.  Nice to have covered parking.
reviews.response: Thanks Arif for your kind words
